title: Mobile Application Developer
description: Log Binary is looking for a skilled Mobile Application Developer proficient in Android and React Native to design, develop, and maintain high-quality mobile applications.
requirements: 2 to 4 years of experience in mobile app development,Proficiency in Android and React Native,Understanding of full mobile development life cycle,Experience with third-party libraries,RESTful APIs, and Git,Strong UI/UX knowledge,Agile development experience preferred
benefits: Competitive salary,Flexible working hours,Opportunity to work on diverse projects,Remote work flexibility,Learning and development opportunities
